document_data.name: Mesika
document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|38}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Mesika''' was a [[way of the sacred stone|sacred stone]] [[monk]]{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|17}}
document_data.Description: Mesika was a young woman. She had dark skin, green eyes, and dark hair.
document_data.Personality: Mesika was determined and secretive. She hated [[necromancy]] in all forms.
document_data.Possessions: Mesika possessed a magical [[bracer]] engraved with the symbol of [[Ubtao]] that could grant others resistance to [[spell]]s.{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|44}}
document_data.Relationships: Mesika was allies with the [[Harper]] agent [[Soggy Wren]].{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|42}}
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]] around [[1490 DR]], Mesika was in [[Port Nyanzaru]]. She worked to obtain the [[Oracle's Eye]], a part of a [[dreamer's amulet]] that was being offered as a prize in a [[dinosaur]] race.{{Cite adventurers league/A City on the Edge|36}}
